a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP per capita in international and market dollars, India, 1960 to 2020
Both series are adjusted for inflation. Market dollar data converts local currencies using the exchange rates
observed in currency markets. International dollar data adjusts for differences in the cost of living between
Note: Market dollar data is in constant 2015 US$. International dollar data is in 2017 prices.
Data source: World Bank and OECD, Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
